page.title: 15THE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The Centre was opened in December 1983 as part of an extension and modernisation of Strathaven Academy. East Kilbride District Council contributed Â£192,000 while the Regional Council paid the rest as part of the school extension.The money for the centre originated as part of the Government Rate Support Grant and Capital Allocations.Among the clubs using the Centre are Netball, Karate,Table Tennis,Roller Hockey and Gymnastics.Classes and courses on Judo,Trampolining,aerobics etc. are available.Other activities include 5 a side soccer,handball,roller skating,squash(two courts) and basketball. Membership of the Centre also applies to the John Wright, Duncanrig and Greenhills centres.Cost of membership is Â£5.80 for family, Â£2.90 for adult and Â£1.45 for junior.
